imageretainer.settings.systemOnly.title: System Compendiums Only
imageretainer.settings.systemOnly.descri: Only backup from or restore to system compendiums. Somewhat cleaner and safer.
imageretainer.settings.ignoreSVG.title: Ignore Foundry SVG Images
imageretainer.settings.ignoreSVG.descrip: Whether to ignore foundry's default SVGs when doing backups. If you want to check if the current system is using any external art, you may wish to turn this off.
imageretainer.restore.title: Restore Image Paths?
imageretainer.restore.description: This will restore your custom images from backup. It may take a while.
imageretainer.restore.newVersion: A new game system version has been detected. Run restore? This may take a while. If you cancel, you can still run the restoration manually.
imageretainer.backup.title: Backup Image Paths?
imageretainer.backup.description: This will store your custom images so Image Retainer can restore them after you update your game system. It may take a while.
imageretainer.notify.startRestore: Image Retainer: Starting restore, this may take some time.
imageretainer.notify.startBackup: Image Retainer: Starting backup, this may take a some time.
